overview: A young man descends the stairs of his apartment building and realizes that he is still on the same floor. When he begins to explore his surroundings, he meets a supernatural being with whom whenever he comes into contact he loses his senses and also a part of himself.

production_companies.name: Film School of the Aristotle University of Thessaloniki

tagline: After a series of strange phenomena in the stairwell of his apartment building, a young man is stalked by a supernatural being.
title: The photographer
